title: User Identifiers Table for Contact Resolution

title: OS notifications for sync completion

Helps users know when data is ready, especially for long-running syncs like iPhone backup import on Windows. Should cover: auto-login sync, manual refresh, wired iPhone sync on PC.

title: Add manual Check for Updates button
Error Logging Service + Supabase Dashboard
variance: CRITICAL: Add error logging to Supabase for production monitoring. Components: 1) error_logs table (DONE) 2) errorLoggingService that captures errors globally + breadcrumb tracking 3) User feedback prompt submitted with logs 4) Broker Portal dashboard. Captures: device info OS/memory/disk auth state db state sync status navigation history.

title: Enhanced ErrorScreen with Reset and User Feedback
variance: CRITICAL: Extend ErrorScreen. Add: 1) Retry button 2) User feedback textarea 3) Submit logs to Supabase 4) RESET APP DATA button - clears local storage + keychain then restarts fresh 5) Confirmation dialog 6) Self-healing for corrupted state. Split into TASK-1800 (logging) and TASK-1802 (reset). Depends on BACKLOG-612.

title: Fix onboarding race condition - needsTermsAcceptance default
variance: Fix: Change needsTermsAcceptance default from true to false in electron/main.ts. Returning users with terms already accepted in Supabase shouldnt see terms screen again.

title: Graceful skip for syncs when no local user exists
variance: Fix: SyncOrchestrator and handlers should gracefully skip (return empty) when getValidUserId returns null instead of erroring. Prevents No valid user found crashes during deferred DB init. PR #737 merged.

title: Domain Claim & User Capture
variance: IT admin claims email domain via DNS TXT verification then captures existing users with matching domain emails into org during 14-day window. Includes capture report and SSO migration.

title: Bulk Edit Role Feature for User Management
variance: Add bulk role editing: BulkEditRoleModal component, UserTableRow with selection, bulkUpdateRole server action, UserActionsDropdown Edit Role option.

title: Message Import Date Filter (Default 6 Months)
variance: Implemented in TASK-1952 (PR #798). Date range and count cap filters added to macOS message import. Extended by BACKLOG-657 with default values and cap warnings.

title: Auto-Link Search Cloud Email Providers
variance: Extend autoLinkService to search Outlook Graph API and Gmail API when a contact is added to a transaction. Currently auto-link only finds emails already saved locally. New flow: search local first then hit cloud APIs using contact email addresses and save new matches to local emails table before linking. Building blocks exist in OutlookFetchService.searchEmails() and GmailFetchService.

title: Sync Status Indicator Stuck After Completion
variance: Sync status bar shows Contacts and Messages as complete (green checkmarks and full progress bar) but never auto-dismisses. Observed with agent@izzyrescue.org. Sync completes successfully (358 messages imported) but indicator stays visible. May be related to auth state transition: status goes ready -> unauthenticated -> ready during deep-link auth flow which may prevent the dismiss timer from firing.

title: Upgrade Electron v35 to v40
file: Upgrade Electron from v35.7.5 to v40.x. Key changes: Node.js 22→24 (native module rebuild required); macOS 12 minimum (drop Big Sur); clipboard API deprecated in renderer; session.extensions API rename; crypto tightening (RSA ≥2048). Direct jump viable given existing contextBridge architecture.

title: Encrypt session.json with safeStorage
description: Supabase access_token and refresh_token stored in plaintext in session.json in user data directory. Should use Electron safeStorage API (same mechanism as DB key) to encrypt tokens at rest. Currently relies only on OS file permissions.

title: Replace or patch imessage-parser transitive vulnerability chain
description: imessage-parser ^0.1.0 pulls in sqlite3 which has 13 high-severity npm audit findings via tar (path traversal CVE-2024-28863) and make-fetch-happen. Either replace imessage-parser with a direct implementation or pin patched transitive deps. PR #901 merged.

title: Delete empty electron/schema.sql artifact
file: 0-byte file at electron/schema.sql is confusing — real schema is at electron/database/schema.sql. Delete the empty file.

title: Remove deprecated components still imported in AppRouter
file: 6 components marked @deprecated still imported in AppRouter.tsx: AppleDriverSetup KeychainExplanation PhoneTypeSelection AndroidComingSoon SetupProgressIndicator WelcomeTerms. Remove imports and delete files if fully replaced by onboarding/steps/ equivalents.

title: Replace 83 console.log statements with logService
file: 83 console.log calls across 22 production files. Project has structured logService — migrate remaining console.log calls or remove debug output. ESLint no-console rule warns but is not enforced in CI.

title: Fix backlog CSV status casing inconsistencies
file: 7 items with lowercase 'pending' and 4 with lowercase 'completed' and 1 'testing' and 1 'deferred' — should be title-case per CI validation. Also 1 item with 'Blocked' status which is not valid.

title: Make lint and npm audit blocking in CI
file: Both eslint and npm audit steps in CI have continue-on-error: true — failures do not block PRs. Remove continue-on-error to enforce lint quality and security audit gates.

title: Add Electron backend tests to CI pipeline
file: 116 test files in electron/ (90 service + 15 util + 11 handler) do not run in CI — only src/ tests execute. Add electron test paths to CI testMatch configuration.

title: Raise CI test coverage threshold from 24% to 40%
file: Current CI coverage threshold is 24% (SPRINT-037 baseline). Raised to 40% via PR #888.

title: Gitignore mad.db and backlog-dashboard.html
file: Both files appear as untracked in repo root. mad.db is a local SQLite database and backlog-dashboard.html is a generated artifact — both should be in .gitignore.

title: Consolidate duplicate backlog items for contacts and test coverage
file: ~20 contact-related items with overlap (BACKLOG-143/145/165 duplicate contacts; BACKLOG-418/463 contact UX redesigns). ~8 test coverage items could be consolidated under BACKLOG-273 umbrella.

title: Migrate Google OAuth from client secret to PKCE flow
description: Desktop app ships GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET in binary — cannot truly protect it. Microsoft already uses PKCE via MSAL. Google OAuth for installed apps should use PKCE per RFC 8252 to eliminate client secret requirement. PR #902 merged -- migrated to PKCE with client_secret hybrid approach.

title: Prevent source map leakage when SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN is unset
description: Vite config deletes .js.map files only after Sentry upload. If SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN is not set the Sentry plugin does not run and source maps ship in the distributable — aids reverse engineering. Add unconditional map deletion in build step. PR #900 merged.

title: Auto-generate window.d.ts from preload bridge modules
file: window.d.ts is 1941 lines manually maintained in sync with 16 preload bridge modules. Fragile and error-prone. Create a codegen script that reads bridge exports and generates the type declarations automatically.

title: Add @typescript-eslint plugin to ESLint config
file: No TypeScript-aware ESLint rules at config level. @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any and @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-assignment are only referenced in inline disable comments. Add the plugin and configure key rules.

title: Add react-hooks/exhaustive-deps ESLint rule
file: No enforcement of useEffect dependency arrays. Missing exhaustive-deps rule can cause stale closures and subtle bugs. Add eslint-plugin-react-hooks and enable exhaustive-deps as warning.

title: Split oversized service files (folderExportService transactionService contactDbService)
file: Three service files exceed maintainability thresholds: folderExportService.ts (2594 lines) transactionService.ts (2083 lines) contactDbService.ts (1719 lines). Extract logical sub-modules to improve testability and review.

title: Remove Supabase service_role key fallback from client app
description: supabaseService.ts uses SUPABASE_ANON_KEY || SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY as fallback. The service_role key bypasses all RLS and should never exist in a client app. Remove the fallback and rotate the key. Existing TODO in code acknowledges this.

title: Settings: prompt user to download and install when update available
variance: Check for Updates button only shows "Update available (vX.Y.Z)" for 5 seconds then resets. Should show download progress and an Install & Restart button. Wire onAvailable/onProgress/onDownloaded event listeners in Settings.tsx to give users a complete in-app update experience. Related: BACKLOG-475.

title: Fix pre-existing contact-handlers.test.ts and App.test.tsx failures
file: 18 tests in contact-handlers.test.ts fail on develop baseline due to SPRINT-085 contactDbService extraction. 1 test in App.test.tsx fails due to PR #883 removing PhoneTypeStep route from AppRouter. Assigned to TASK-2012 Phase 1.5. PR #885.

title: Add session timeout and auto-logout for broker portal
Session timeout with idle lock for desktop app (SOC 2)
Internal support portal for customer account management
Sticky tab bar with scroll-spy for Settings modal
description: Sticky navigation tab bar at top of Settings modal. Highlights currently visible section via IntersectionObserver scroll-spy. Includes click-to-scroll; bottom-detection for small sections; license-gated AI tab filtering. PR #895.

title: Email Server Integration for Outbound Communications
description: Transactional email service layer (SMTP/Resend/SendGrid) for user invites and account-related communications (password reset; verification; security notifications).

title: Mask iCloud Email Identifier in 1:1 Chat Exports
description: When a contact's iMessage handle is an Apple ID (email address) show contact name + '(via iCloud email)' instead of the raw email in 1:1 chat PDF and folder exports.

title: Merge Duplicate 1:1 Chats (iCloud Email vs Phone Number for Same Contact)
description: Merged with BACKLOG-542 into TASK-2025. Display-layer merge of duplicate 1:1 threads when contact uses both iCloud email and phone number handles. Related to BACKLOG-747. PR #905 merged.

title: Group chat participants show phone numbers instead of resolved contact names
description: In text (SMS/MMS) group chats participant phone numbers are not being resolved to their matching contact names. Users see raw phone numbers instead of display names for group chat members.

title: Email attachments and messages not syncing from folders outside Inbox/Sent
description: Attachments from emails outside the Inbox folder are not being pulled. Needs investigation whether the email sync itself is limited to Inbox and Sent folders only — potentially missing emails and attachments from subfolders and other mailbox folders entirely.

title: Google Places address autocomplete not working (billing not enabled)
description: Google Places API returned REQUEST_DENIED because billing was not enabled on the Google Cloud Project. Fixed by enabling billing at console.cloud.google.com. No code change required. TASK-2022.

title: Messages tab doesn't update until transaction is reopened
description: When messages are linked to a transaction the Messages tab in Transaction Details doesn't show newly linked messages until the user exits and reopens the transaction details. UI reactivity issue -- data saves correctly but component doesn't re-render. TASK-2023. PR #903 merged.

title: Import Google Contacts via People API
description: Add ability to import contacts from Google Contacts using the People API. When a user connects their Google account (already has OAuth), offer to import their Google contacts into the local contacts database. Requires adding People API scope (https://www.googleapis.com/auth/contacts.readonly) to the Google OAuth consent screen and implementing a contactImportService that fetches contacts via the People API and merges them with existing local contacts.

title: Unify channel/communication_type naming and add isTextMessage() helper
description: Two competing systems for channel identification: channel (typed: email|sms|imessage) vs communication_type (untyped: text|imessage). API uses 'text' but Message.channel uses 'sms'/'imessage'. Create isTextMessage() and isEmailMessage() helpers and update ~10 files. TASK-2024.

title: Group chat participant missing and messages attributed to wrong sender
description: extractAllPhones() only reads from/to fields not chat_members. iMessage email handles not resolved by phone-only lookup. Missing participants and wrong sender attribution in group chats. Export normalizePhone bug stripped email handles to empty strings. TASK-2026 (PR #906) + TASK-2027 (PR #907).
